mapper.sql: t.id, t.title, t.summary, t.content, t.comment_num, t.path, t.create_date, t.last_update, t.category_id
mapper.select: select t.id, t.title, t.path, t.summary, t.content, t.comment_num, t.create_date, t.last_update, t.category_id from doc_journal t limit #{offset} ,#{length}
select t.id, t.title, t.path, t.summary, t.content, t.comment_num, t.create_date, t.last_update, t.category_id from doc_journal t where t.path = #{path} limit 0 ,1

select t.id, t.title, t.path, t.summary, t.content, t.comment_num, t.create_date, t.last_update, t.category_id from doc_journal t,doc_category c where c.path = #{catPath} and c.id = t.category_id limit #{offset} ,#{length}

select t.id, t.title, t.path, t.summary, t.content, t.comment_num, t.create_date, t.last_update, t.category_id from doc_journal t,doc_tag dc,doc_tag_journal dtj where dc.name = #{tagName} and dc.id = dtj.tag_id and t.id = dtj.journal_id limit #{offset} ,#{length}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into doc_journal title, path, summary, content, create_date, category_id values #{title}, #{path}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{categoryId}
mapper.update: update doc_journal set title = #{title}, path = #{path}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content}, create_date = #{createDate}, category_id = #{categoryId} where id = #{id}
